name: zara-jean
description:
Puffer anorak (100% polyester) 
- Long sleeves with inner cuffs
- Front welt pockets with fleece lining and zip fastening
- Adjustable hem with elastic interior drawstrings
- Zip-up front
Made in Myanmar
suggestion: Model is 1m75 / 5'7 and wearing a size L
care:
Do not wash
 Do not use bleach
 Do not iron
 Do not dry clean
 Do not tumble dry
